errors.emailInvalid: Email not valid. It must include an @, and must end with a domain name

descriptionStep.label: Who are you ?
descriptionStep.placeholder: The members of the group 'Antarctic Lemur' merge their passion for alternative rock and electro-pop to create a unique musical experience. 'Antarctic Lemur' offers a bewitching atmosphere where energy and sensitivity mingle.

descriptionHelper.artist: Describe yourself in some words to inform hosts who you are
descriptionHelper.host: Describe yourself in some words to inform artists who you are

artist.label: In which city are you present?
artist.addressHelper: Major city where you perform yourself

profilePictureStep.helper: Everyone will be able to recognize you with this image
